[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA], I will of course obey your will and convert to [From.Culture.GetName]! Our bonds, as well as my people's shall be strengthened!
[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA], I utterly refuse this outrageous demand. I will not abandon my [From.Culture.GetName] culture in favor of your [Root.Culture.GetName].
Usurp this title regardless of limitations.

Create a Lord Paramount of Beyond The Wall

The lands beyond The Wall have gone uncivilized for too long! Their constant raids and savagery must be put to an end, and to accomplish that, we must take up arms against them and march North, beyond the barrier that separates us.
Our initial advance has proven to be successful, and our armies have defeated the Wildlings, gaining us lands which we can grant to good men from back home to look over our winnings.
We have gained a foothold beyond the great ice barrier, but it's not enough. We must keep expanding and push them back to secure our influence and power over the area.

Nearly half ot the known settled lands beyond The Wall have fallen to our grand expeditionary armies. We must now make a move against the Northernmost tribes, and secure that end of the border from any more raids.
Only the last remaining set of tribes remain to the West. We must annex them into the Realm and finally put and end to the Wildling menace! These savages shall fall and civilization shall set in.

Our invasion beyond The Wall has been succesful, the Wildlings have submitted to us and all the formerly uncivilized lands have now begun to accept the fact that we rule over them. But, we must grant the honour of Lord Paramount to somebody who governs those lands locally to better administrate them.
We control the lands both North and South of the Wall, rendering it useless. It's time we incorporate it into our realm, as it's done what it was supposed to and is no longer needed.
I do not wish to have children any more, I shall commit my life to celibacy.
I wish to have children again, and for that I have to renounce my celibacy.
